The following exception is caught when the monitor tab in launch configuration is pending the list of data collector.

Exception in thread "org.eclipse.hyades.execution.core.task.ReusableThread@84e084e" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.util.AgentControllerDescriptor.versionIsAtLeast(AgentControllerDescriptor.java:67)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.util.AgentControllerDescriptor.isVersionAtLeast(AgentControllerDescriptor.java:194)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.file.FileManagerFactory$3.run(FileManagerFactory.java:413)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.core.task.ReusableThread.run(ReusableThread.java:131)
Eugene, this should be resolved in the newer drivers.  Please let me know if you can still reproduce this in the new drivers.

This problem no longer exist with the TPTP-4.4.0-200704251212 build. However, as discussed with Navid, we will leave this defect opened and Navid will improve the IAC code so in case there are problem with the setup in the future, it will fail gracefully.

Essentially this problem occurs when you have the hyades.execution plugin checked out in your workspace.  When this is done, the plugin is not recognized as an IAC plugin and its corresponding configuration file is not generated.  The error is as result of the plugin configuration not being generated.  I'll keep this defect open to add a validator to IAC's plugin config generator so it can be notified when this happens.

Updating summary accordingly.
*** Bug 185435 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I fixed this in i3 as it was causing a lot of problems.
